+ ## 2. VERSION INFORMATION
+ 
+ ### Backend Services
+ - **Spring Boot Version:** 3.5.7
+ - **Java Version:** 21
+ - **Spring Cloud Version:** 2025.0.0
+ - **Maven Version:** 4.0.0
+ 
+ ### Frontend Web
+ - **React Version:** 19.1.1
+ - **Vite Version:** 7.1.2
+ - **Node.js:** LTS version
+ 
+ ### Mobile Application
+ - **React Native Version:** 0.81.5
+ - **Expo SDK Version:** ~54.0.25
+ - **React Version:** 19.1.0
+ 
+ ### Database
+ - **PostgreSQL:** Latest stable version (Railway hosted)
+ - **Redis:** Latest version (Redis Cloud)
+ 
+ ### Message Broker
+ - **Kafka/Redpanda:** Latest stable version
+ 
+ ---
+ 
+ ## 3. DELIVERY FORMAT
+ 
+ T·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c deliverable items ƒë∆∞·ª£c cung c·∫•p d∆∞·ªõi c√°c ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng sau:
+ 
+ 1. **Source Code:** 
+    - Backend: Java source files (.java), Maven configuration (.xml)
+    - Frontend: JavaScript/JSX files (.js, .jsx), CSS files (.css)
+    - Mobile: JavaScript files (.js), React Native components
+ 
+ 2. **Configuration Files:**
+    - YAML files (.yml, .yaml) cho Spring Boot configuration
+    - Markdown files (.md) cho documentation
+    - SQL files (.sql) cho database scripts
+    - Environment files (.env.example)
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Files:**
+    - Docker files (Dockerfile)
+    - Docker Compose files (.yml)
+    - Kubernetes manifests (.yaml)
+    - Shell scripts (.sh, .ps1)
+ 
+ 4. **Documentation:**
+    - Markdown files (.md)
+    - PDF files (n·∫øu c√≥)
+    - Diagram files (.drawio)
+ 
+ ---
